author: ddewolf
msg: Updates to coincide with the introduction of optional services (Removal of PortletURLService from basic services)

author: ddewolf
msg: Adding support for the OptionalServiceFactory (Request and Response Factories, etc. . .)

author: ddewolf
msg: The PortletURLService is now an optional service.

author: blumm
msg: These changes enable the setSecure method, so that protocol HTTPS will be used instead of HTTP.
You must edit "webapps/pluto/WEB-INF/config/services/ConfigService.properties" to use the right HTTPS port for your installation.
